mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENTLOC(PATIENTLOCNO, PATIENTLONGITUDE, PATIENTLATITUDE, PATIENTLOCTIME, PATIENTNO) VALUES(PLOC_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{patientLongitude}, #{patientLatitude}, #{patientLoctime} , #{patientNo})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PATIENTLATITUDE, PATIENTLONGITUDE FROM PATIENTLOC WHERE PATIENTNO = #{patientNo} AND PATIENTLOCTIME = (SELECT MAX(PATIENTLOCTIME) FROM PATIENTLOC WHERE PATIENTNO = #{patientNo})

SELECT DISTINCT PATIENTLATITUDE, PATIENTLONGITUDE FROM PATIENTLOC WHERE PATIENTNO = (SELECT PATIENTNO FROM SERVICEAPPLY WHERE SERVICENO = #{value}) AND PATIENTLOCTIME = (SELECT MAX(PATIENTLOCTIME) FROM PATIENTLOC WHERE PATIENTNO = (SELECT PATIENTNO FROM SERVICEAPPLY WHERE SERVICENO = #{value}))
